page.title: Telekom Austria Wins Mobiltel Bid Option for \$2.1 Bln (Update2)
page.text: Telekom Austria AG, the country #39;s biggest phone operator, won the right to buy Bulgaria #39;s largest mobile phone company, MobilTel EAD, for 1.6 billion euros (\$2.1 billion), an acquisition that would add 3 million subscribers.
